title: Runes changing themself
body: Why do runes change from on page to another between games, before the rune/masteries merge all would stay the same between games.

replies.body: Do you mean the default page that's selected or the runes themselves are being changed without you noticing? I've noticed this myself that it seems to reset to the preset Resolve page here lately, and I'd suggest posting about it again over in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) to get more attention drawn.
